house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1972 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 2957 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Universal Investme Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Elevator, Foyer, Ocean Access, Tennis Court(s)
